title: Swifty Blue on Tyga Conflict, Artists Checking In, PNB Rock's Murder & More
description:
Adam sits down with Swifty Blue, after he recently made headlines expressing his beliefs about the music industry, Tyga, and more.

-----
00:00 Intro
1:10 - Swifty jokes that he was the one who made Tyga take down the “Ay Caramba” video
2:34 - Swifty explains his reaction to Tyga’s offensive “Ay Caramba” music video 
3:48 - Demanding respect for Hispanic culture
6:03 - Swifty respects Tyga for taking the “Ay Caramba” video down
7:41 - Reacting to American Cholo’s comments on the Tyga situation. Respecting how Adam handled the whole beef like a G
13:06 - Swifty offers to pay Adam to let him f*ght Almighty Suspect
13:36 - Won’t discuss his comments on not signing to a black label
14:24 - Swifty isn’t r*c*st, he’s institutionalized
15:04 - Swifty wants to know where Almighty Suspect’s chain is at
16:02 - Adam attempts to set up a conversation between Swifty and Almighty Suspect. Swifty says he might make an exception for Adam
21:24 - Swifty feels like DoKnow doesn’t like him. Says DoKnow sided with his opps
22:32 - Swifty advises DoKnow to stop drinking and start listening to Adam
24:18 - Can’t do a song with Crip Mac 
24:34 - Swifty explains how his collab with Kodak came about. How Kodak pulled up to the hood with no security
26:31 - Reacting to PNB Rock 
28:45 - How to figure out the right people to tap in with
31:27 - Swifty says he would go to the ends of the earth to get Adam’s chain back
36:50 - Swifty wants to do a song with Trippie Redd
37:21 - Doe Boy reveals he just got sh*t 3 times last month in front of his store

-----
